about_the_game:
Dreams. Kingdom come. The Astral. How connected are they? Is it possible to dive into a conscious dream and pave a path to those who are no longer with us? A far more troubling question is whether it is possible to go back alone.
But THEY will know...

The main character will have to find his own answers. Who is a friend and who is an enemy? Maxim has to wade through thorns to help his loved ones and try not to fall into the trap himself. He will be hunted by entities that he could not imagine. What's real and what's not? Face-to-face with the inexplicable, dangers, hard decisions, and trials at the limit. All this in the new visual horror novel Karpov!

About gameplay:
Visual novel - a genre that involves the passage of the story of the story with choices that fall on the players, on which the consequences will depend.

Project Features:
- The techniques described in the story, conscious dreams are from real practice. If you're interested in trying it, you might be able to do it;
- "Living" characters who have their own tempers, stories and fears;
- Visual style, music, sounds and animation contribute to the immersive effect.

short_description: "Karpov" is a visual horror novel shrouded in mysticism.Do you see THEM? Sneaking around in the shadows. Hiding their motives. You are far from the first to confront them. Are you sure you're strong enough? How presumptuous. Take your time. One false step and you won't be able to go back.
